text: @NYGovCuomo @mariasacchetti Test people for G6PD see Switzerland report: COVID-19  infection  can  trigger  severe  acute  haemolytic  crisis  in  G6PD-deficient  patients. Why is no one looking at this? G6PD blood deficiency affects 400mil people.  It is the ultimate "pre-existing condition".
